name: BigQuery Export Limit
description: There is a limit on the BigQuery Export. If the daily export exceed 1 million events, it is paused. Learn more in the documentation on BigQuery Export. This test evaluates hits by type using the threshold for free GA property. For the 360 properties the limit is substantially higher (more information can be found in the official documentation.

constants.name: dailyExportLimit
constants.description: Daily limit for BigQuery Export for free GA properties

constants.name: timingLimits
constants.description: Official caps on the amount timing hits processed daily based on the amount of pageview hits (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/analyticsjs/user-timings#sampling_considerations)
constants.example: [{min: 0, max: 100000, value: 10000, multiple: null}, {min: 100000, max: null, value: null, multiple: 0.01}]
